thread.title: Daniel
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Daniel

author: Daniel
title: Daniel
text: We went into homezone knowing we were going to buy a dining table set. We weren't sure which one though. We were approached by 3 different people whuse we were there on pressuring buying something. That's why I give a 4/5 stars. I like to be left alone while buying, I'll let the store people know if/when I want to buy something.
